title: While I wait for a riot response for my ticket, question on computing freezing only for league
body:
I figured this has happened before, this issue isn't really unique.

Short and sweet: Once I get in-game in aram, rift, or any map, my computer completely crashes(freezes?) and I have to force restart.

Things that could have caused it prior to this happening:
- Windows 10 updated on my computer without my permission on the 13th.
 - Living with my mom for a couple weeks and she has the charter internet provider. I'm using a router + ethernet combo.


Did you do anything to try and fix it Alumini? hell yeah.
- re-installed league
- checked for memory issues - ALL GOOD
- checked for driver errors - ALL GOOD
- followed riots' possible solutions - DIDN'T WORK
- tried the option where you can scan file in league for issues - DIDNT WORK
- reinstalled league again - NO BINGO

What's your observation during this freeze Alumini? 
 Well, my screen freezes when everyone spawns and then I have to force restart. 
- My computer makes an odd humming noise.

Humming noise? Then something is wrong internally. Get your computer checked out.
- Yea but this isn't some permanent thing, this only occurs when I spawn in league. So something is causing it to do this... right? I can play other game fine.


Haven't played league since last Saturday, itching to play :(

god bless and thank you.

replies.body: Thanks for everything you've tried so far!  The detailed information helps a lot and gives me a few ideas.  You mentioned that your OS was updated, and I'm assuming it may have been the Windows 10 anniversary update.  Some players were freezing due to an issue with the[ Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Can you try disabling it, and let me know if that gets you fixed up?  Let me know, and we'll go from there!
Wow! It worked! That's some next level issue spotting! I'm able to play perfectly  without any issues (so far). Thank you Porocles!

Woohoo!  Happy to help, Alumini!  Now go and scratch that itch!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
that fix worked for everyone but me haha
I restored to previous version of windows trying to see if it fixed it... let you know in 10 minutes considering lever buster has now screwed me
